title: Status Effects
content: Incapacitated Cannot take Actions or Reactions. Lose Concentration, if maintaining a Concentration spell. Infested Crawling with tiny spiders that deal 1d4 Piercing damage and 1d4 Poison damage each turn. When hit with a melee attack, the infestation spreads to the attacker. Upon death, the infestation spreads to all nearby creatures. Invisible Has Advantage on Attack Rolls and imposes Disadvantage on enemy Attack Rolls. Lethargic Can't move or take Actions, Bonus Actions, or Reactions. Lightni
